pr_title: Use the latest available ASM version

timeline.message:
Use the latest available ASM version

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Seems we need a persistent issue to keep this updated. Java 16 builds will start happening soon I hope.
timeline.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: Java 16 doesn't introduce any new ASM versions as compared with Java 15 right now, but, yes, that might change: I created #9990.
replies.author: keithc-ca
